Directions: In a bowl, combine the onion, ketchup, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce and crackers.  Crumble beef over mixture and mix well.  Shape into 1-in. balls.  Place in ungreased 15-in. x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pans.
Bake, uncovered, at 400 degrees F for 10 minutes or until meat is no longer pink.  Serve meatballs immediately, or refrigerate or freeze for use in other recipes.
